## **Prove that: $\Gamma(\frac{1}{2})=\sqrt\pi$**

$\Large\mbox{Let}$

$$
\large I = \int^{\infty}_{0}t^{-\frac{1}{2}exp(-t)}dt\qquad\Rightarrow\qquad I^2 = \int^{\infty}_{0}\int^{\infty}_{0}\frac{1}{\sqrt{ts}}exp(-(t+s))dtds
$$
